io.github.daveho.funwithsound

Class SynthToolkitBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.daveho.funwithsound.SynthToolkitBuilder

  • public class SynthToolkitBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Fluid builder for creating a SynthToolkit using the available Voice and NoteEnvelope implementations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SynthToolkit getTk()
      Get the completed SynthToolkit.
      static SynthToolkitBuilder start()
      Start a new SynthToolkitBuilder.
      SynthToolkitBuilder withASRNoteEnvelope()
      Specify that ASRNoteEnvelope should be used as the NoteEnvelope implementation.
      SynthToolkitBuilder withBandpassFilterNoteEnvelopeAdapter()
      Specify that a BandpassFilterNoteEnvelopeAdapter should be used to adapt the previously specified NoteEnvelope.
      SynthToolkitBuilder withOnOffNoteEnvelope()
      Specify that OnOffNoteEnvelope should be used as the NoteEnvelope.
      SynthToolkitBuilder withRingModulationVoice(net.beadsproject.beads.data.Buffer modWaveform, net.beadsproject.beads.data.Buffer carrierWaveform)
      Specify that RingModulationVoice should be used as the Voice implementation.
      SynthToolkitBuilder withWaveVoice(net.beadsproject.beads.data.Buffer waveform)
      Specify that WaveVoice should be used as the Voice implementation.
